summary: Frontend testing for cache-first performance overhaul on 5 profile pages. FIXED: Added missing ActivityIndicator import to all 5 files. All pages load instantly without full-page spinners.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed 5 files with missing ActivityIndicator import from react-native: edit.tsx, badges.tsx, notifications.tsx, invoices.tsx, [id]/badges.tsx
All pages now have ActivityIndicator properly imported and can show inline loading indicators where needed
Cache-first pattern correctly implemented - pages render instantly with cached or empty state

test_credentials.note: Login tested but authentication state does not persist across page navigations in browser automation

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 183 verified cache-first pattern for 5 profile pages: /profile/edit, /profile/badges, /profile/notifications, /profile/invoices, /profile/[id]/badges. Fixed 5 bugs - all files were missing ActivityIndicator import. All pages load instantly without full-page spinners. Total pages refactored this session: 26 (8 settings + 4 property + 5 auto/checkout + 4 blog/premium/tabs + 5 profile).
